links.*: The Lord of the Rings: A Reader's Companion
The Lord of the Rings (film series)
Tolkien: A Look Behind The Lord of the Rings

wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[2 January|2]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes letters [[letter 308|308]] and [[letter 309|309]].
* '''[[6 January|6]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes a [[letter to Paula Coston (6 January 1969)|letter to Paula Coston]].
* '''[[11 January|11]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 309a]].
* '''[[27 January|27]]''' - Actor and author [[Cliff Broadway]] is born.
* '''?''' - The first issue of [[Mythlore 1|Mythlore]] is published.

==February==
* '''[[3 February|3]]''' - [[Shane Rangi]], who would play several characters and lead the stunt crew of [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]], is born.
* '''?''' - [[David Salo]], Tolkien Linguist, is born.
==March==
* '''[[6 March|6]]''' - Scholar [[Gergely Nagy]] is born.
* '''[[13 March|13]]''' - [[Adam Tolkien]] is born.
* '''[[15 March|15]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Amy Ronald (15 March 1969)|a letter to Amy Ronald]].
* '''[[20 March|20]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Amy Ronald (20 March 1969)|a letter to Amy Ronald]].
* '''?''' - ''[[Tolkien: A Look Behind The Lord of the Rings]]'' is published.
==April==
* '''[[8 April|8]]''' - Actor [[Ian Hughes]] is born.
* '''?''' - [[Mythlore 2]] is published.
==May==
* '''[[7 May|7]]''' - Producer [[Rick Porras]] is born.
* '''[[14 May|14]]''' - [[Cate Blanchett]], who would play [[Galadriel]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]], is born.
* '''[[20 May|20]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 310]].
==June==
* '''[[30 June|30]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes a [[letter to Paul Bibire]].
==July==
* '''[[8 July|8]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] is diagnosed with an inflamed or diseased gall-bladder. Dr. Denis Tolhurst forbids him the consummation of fats (notably butter) and, in the eyes of the patient even worse, alcohol.
* '''[[16 July|16]]''' - [[Royd Tolkien]] is born.
* '''[[19 July|19]]''' - Voice actress [[Courtenay Taylor]] is born.
* '''[[22 July|22]]''' - Actor [[James Arnold Taylor]] is born.
* '''[[31 July|31]]''' - J.R.R. Tolkien writes [[Letter 311]].

==August== 
* '''[[1 August|1]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Mr Burrows|a letter to Mr Burrows]].
* '''[[5 August|5]]''' - Actress [[Kim Mai Guest]] is born.
* '''[[6 August|6]]''' - [[Chris Edgerly]], who would voice various characters in [[Electronic Arts|EA]] video games, is born.
==September==
* '''[[29 September|29]]''' -  Artist [[Warren Mahy]] is born.
==October==
* '''[[1 October|1]]''' - Actor [[Charles Edwards]] is born.
* '''?''' - The anthology ''[[The Young Magicians]]'', which includes two poems by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien (by Catherine Stimpson)|‎J.R.R. Tolkien]]'', a study by Catherine R. Stimpson, is published.‎
* '''[[10 October|10]]''' - Actor [[Manu Bennett]] is born.

==November==
* '''[[6 November|6]]''' - Informal date of foundation of [[The Tolkien Society]].
* '''[[7 November|7]]''' - [[Vera Chapman]] announces the foundation of [[The Tolkien Society]] in the ''New Statesman''.
* '''[[16 November|16]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 312]].
* '''[[25 November|25]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 313]].

==December==
* '''[[15 December|15]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 314]].
==?==
* '''?''' - [[Charles Leslie Wrenn]], [[Inklings|Inkling]], dies.
* '''?''' - ''[[Bored of the Rings (book)|Bored of the Rings]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] sells the film, games, and merchandising rights of the books [[The Hobbit]] and [[The Lord of the Rings]] for $250,000 to [[United Artists]].
* '''?''' - First deluxe, one-volume edition of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' by [[Allen & Unwin]].<ref>{{HM|RC}}, p. lii</ref>
{{references}}
